Package acme.exams.views.professor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AssignMarks.AssignMarksViewObserver
    Interface for an observer of the AssignMarksViewInterface
    AssignMarksViewInterface
    Interface for the view used by professor for assigning marks to students
    MenuProfessor.MenuProfessorViewObserver
    Interface for an observer of MenuProfessorViewInterface
    MenuProfessorViewInterface
    Interface for the view that represents the main menu of a professor
    ProfessorExamsList.ProfessorExamsListViewObserver
    Interface for an obsserver of ProfessorExamsListViewInterface
    ProfessorExamsListViewInterface
    Interface for the view used to display the list of exams for a professor
    RegisterProfessor.RegisterProfessorViewObserver
    Observer for RegisterProfessorViewInterface
    RegisterProfessorViewInterface
    Interface for the view used for registering a new professor to the system
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AssignMarks
    View used by professor for assigning mark to students
    ExamTypesGraph
    Class used to shows statistics related to exam types
    MenuProfessor
    Models the main menu view for a professor
    ProfessorExamsList
    Vies showing the list of exams for a professor
    RegisteredStudentsForExamGraph
    View showing statistics about registered students
    RegisterProfessor
    View used for registering a new professor to the system
